about_the_game:
Welcome, OPRTR-B0T-3457!

You are to conduct an intergalactic mining operation, extracting the energy of alien planets and bringing it back to INTERGALACTICORP. Be careful as these alien planets are hostile and brute force will be needed to survive long enough to complete your mission. Do not come back empty-handed.


Your goal is to drill to the planet's core to gather valuable ores and resources, which you can use to upgrade your equipment and purchase new machines from the corporation's shop. But beware, as maintaining your machines is crucial; they can malfunction or require repairs.

MAINTAIN YOUR VESSEL


Always prioritize the maintenance of your vessel. We trusted you with it, and will not tolerate failure. Efficiency is key!

BEWARE OF MALFUNCTIONS


Your devices may malfunction. Make haste in fixing any issue or things may get hectic!

DEFEND AGAINST HOSTILE FORCES


The planets will not be friendly, extract resources and trade them in for valuable upgrades to your defense systems. Use stored excess energy to utilize the true power of your vessel's guns to defeat powerful enemies.

REPUTATION AMONG YOUR PEERS

Your performance within missions is crucial for your reputation in the company, ranking you among the leaderboards. Performing well within missions will unlock access to better equipment and missions to varying galaxies.

short_description: INTERGALACTICORP. is a sci-fi rogue-lite tower defense game where you take on the role of an operator-bot, charged with conducting an intergalactic mining operation. Will you thrive as an efficient miner in this alien environment, or succumb to the dangers that lurk in the depths of space?
